text: Chandan K Anand (born 23 October 1980) is a Mumbai based actor and a certified Reiki practitioner. He was born in New Delhi and has his hometown in New Delhi. Anand began acting after completing his high school education in 1997. == Filmography == * Parched (2016) - Cast * Love Aaj Kal (2009) * Aloo Chaat (film) (2009) * Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii (2007) * Kaafila (2007) - Deep Singh * Mr Ya Miss (2005) Elevator man * The Body (2019) * Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl (2020) == TV Shows == *Yeh Pyar Na Hoga Kam as Omi (The College Goon) *Bhaage Re Mann as Raghav (Ashok Awasthi's Neighbour) * Prem Ya Paheli – Chandrakanta as Krur Singh * The Adventures of Hatim * Stories by Rabindranath Tagore * Dharmakshetra as Yudhisthira * Jhansi Ki Rani (2019 TV series) as Ghaus Khan * Barrister Babu as Binoy Roy Choudhary === Web series === *Rangbaaz (web series) == References == Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian male actors Category:1980 births
title: Chandan K Anand
